name: QuatEuler

arguments.name: x
arguments.desc: Angle around X axis in degrees, sometimes also called roll or bank

arguments.name: y
arguments.desc: Angle around Y axis in degrees, sometimes also called yaw or heading

arguments.name: z
arguments.desc: Angle around Z axis in degrees, sometimes also called pitch or attitude

examples: --Create quaternion representing rotation 30 degrees around Y axis and 25 degrees around Z axis
